column4: Anyone know why when I am trying to install flashplugin-nonfree it says it isn't available if I have multiverse installed? (Edgy)
no idea, but you might prefer to install the FP9 beta anyhow
Webben: is there a howto or a package for that file?
the forums probably have a howto by now; I don't think there's a deb yet
but IIRC you just drop it in your plugins dir
I don't even show flashplugin-nonfree in any of the gui package managers either...
Is that not supported by edgy?
by definition stuff in universe and multiverse is "unsupported"
but it should in theory still /work/
did you install this from source?
it's not "source" it's a compiled plugin
apt-cache show flashplugin-nonfree shows that all that does it pull down a tarfile from Adobe anyway
it just handles the installation and uninstallation for you
what's the default install location for Konq?
run "locate konqueror" to see for yourself
